name: kursor
description: Displays keyboard layout indicator near the cursor and optionally changes cursor color for non-default languages

kursor.defaultLanguage.description: Default keyboard language. The indicator is hidden when this language is active (unless 'Indicate Default Language' is enabled).

kursor.indicateCapsLock.description: Show Caps Lock status by uppercasing the language indicator. Note: limited platform support.

kursor.indicateDefaultLanguage.description: Show the text indicator even when the default language is active.

kursor.cursor.color.description: Cursor color when a non-default language is active. Leave empty to disable cursor color change.

kursor.showTextIndicator.description: Show a text indicator near the cursor displaying the current keyboard language.

kursor.textIndicator.color.description: Text color of the language indicator.

kursor.textIndicator.backgroundColor.description: Background color of the text indicator. Leave empty for no background. When set, creates a color block for better visibility.

kursor.pollingInterval.description: How often to check the keyboard layout in milliseconds.
